title: (x) Nosotros logo font - Neutraface No. 2 Titling {Felix B, Mike Y}
content:
Hello,

Can anybody know what font is this, as shown from( [http://www.nosotroshq.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043457/http:/www.nosotroshq.com/ "http://www.nosotroshq.com/")). I thought at first it was like in the font in nivea.com but it's not.

Also, it's not metro black.
author: lucero

comments.content:
Here is Neutraface No2 Text Bold.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043457im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NeutrafaceNo2Nosotros_5195.gif)

The Display Titling for Neutraface No2 is even bolder, and more like your sample. Maybe this is what FixB meant?

- Mike Yanega

The ‘S’ in the logo isn’t Neutraface at all.  
Except for the ‘N’ this looks a lot like Gotham.  
But it isn’t exactly.

The one in the No. 2 Titling face is much closer than the sample I posted above.

- Mike

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043457im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NOSOTROSneutrafaceno2Ttitling_4230.gif)
Yer, Mike. I think you’re right.
